entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning in the evening and ending after midnight then 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
